test_cases.input: I love designing and solving puzzles, but I don't like reading too much theory.
test_cases.expected_explanation: Your interest in design and puzzle-solving aligns well with STEM fields, particularly in areas like software engineering and data science where creative problem-solving is essential.

test_cases.input: I enjoy helping others and have good communication skills. I'm passionate about mental health and wellness.
test_cases.expected_explanation: Your passion for helping others and interest in mental health makes healthcare an excellent fit, particularly in roles focused on mental health and wellness.

test_cases.input: I'm creative and love working with colors and design. I enjoy expressing myself through art.
test_cases.expected_explanation: Your creative nature and passion for art and design suggests a strong alignment with careers in the arts, where you can express yourself through visual mediums.

test_cases.input: I like numbers and analyzing data. I'm good at making decisions and leading teams.
test_cases.expected_explanation: Your analytical skills and leadership abilities make you well-suited for business roles, particularly in areas like financial analysis or management.

test_case_1.input: I enjoy solving complex problems and writing code. I'm good at mathematics and logical thinking. I don't like repetitive tasks or working in isolation.

test_case_2.input: I love working with people and helping them solve their problems. I'm good at communication and understanding others' needs. I don't enjoy working with numbers or technical details.

test_case_3.input: I'm creative and enjoy designing things. I have a good eye for aesthetics and user experience. I don't like strict rules or rigid structures.
